about_the_game:
DLC-exclusive attachment items. Contains 9 different item designs.

Display Stand: Adol x2
Display Stand: Karja x2
Display Stand: Glenn x2
Display Stand: Rosa x2
Display Stand: Cruz x2
Display Stand: Mirabel x2
Display Stand: Leif x2
Display Stand: Dogi x2
Display Stand: F&P x2

*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After receiving items, change costumes via [Equipment] -> [Costumes] in the main menu.
